February 1 2018 CAS stated that the sanctions against 28 Russian athletes, including Artyom Kuznetsov, were annulled and their individual results achieved in Sochi 2014 reinstated.","47":null,"48":"Men's 500 m - Speed Skating - Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced in pairs on separate tracks (the inner and outer lanes) on a 400 m oval rink. Skaters switched lanes after the first half of the race in order to skate an equal distance.
